description:
The principle of Baramon High, Jirou, asks Yoshiki if he found Mr. Right. 
“That won’t happen in an all-boys school,” Yoshiki responds. But 2 handsome men appears in front of Yoshiki...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fierce Fight! The Handsome Army
Un combat sans merci ! Le bataillon des beaux gosses
激闘! イケメン軍団
